info.title: Navigate to menubar with commands that switch mode from reading to interaction

setupScript.name: focusonfirstlink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link just before the menubar
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the link just before the meunbar
testPageDocument.querySelector('a').focus();

instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Change of mode from reading to interaction is conveyed
The menubar name 'Text Formatting' is conveyed
The menu item name "Font" is conveyed
Availability of a submenu is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the menubar are conveyed
